com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.proxy
Class GrabbingProxyController

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.download.DefaultProxyController
      com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.proxy.GrabbingProxyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProxyController
public class GrabbingProxyController
extends DefaultProxyController

Proxy controller implementation that periodically reloads proxies from the specified urls. Attention: GrabbingProxyController initializes for a long time (because of initial proxy check).

Author:
ameshkov

                               java.net.URL proxyCheckUrl)
Creates an instance of the GrabbingProxyController class.

Parameters:
urlsToGrab - Urls used to grab proxies
proxyCheckUrl - Url used to check if proxy is alive (comparing content downloaded with and without proxy)
